youtube_description:
The Prasad bowls the old-fashioned top-of-off delivery, and Sohail plays all around it. The off stump goes for a walk. 
Famous clip from 1996 cricket world cup QF.
youtube_title: Venkatesh Prasad Vs Aamer sohail - 1996 world cup QF
